detail.main_content:

  3. 3. Deliver the full source code and a user guide.

Deadline: 140 days after this bounty goes live.

üè¢ Real Estate Crowdfunding Platform

Create a platform that allows people to invest in real estate projects with small amounts of money. The platform should make real estate investing more accessible to the average person.

Project Snapshot

Prize Pool 21,000,000 VND

What to Build

A platform with property listings, an investment dashboard, and a secure payment system. The platform should comply with all relevant financial regulations.

How to Submit (3 steps)

  1. 1. Launch the platform with a few initial investment opportunities.
  2. 2. Provide a legal and regulatory compliance report.
  3. 3. Submit the full source code and platform documentation.

Deadline: 90 days after this bounty goes live.

title: Genomic Data Analysis and Visualization Platform

detail.main_content:
üß¨ Genomic Data Analysis and Visualization Platform

Develop a platform for analyzing and visualizing large-scale genomic data. The platform should help researchers uncover insights into the genetic basis of diseases.

Project Snapshot

Prize Pool 39,000,000 VND

What to Build

A platform with tools for genomic data processing, statistical analysis, and interactive visualization. The platform should be able to handle various types of genomic data, such as DNA sequencing and gene expression data.

How to Submit (3 steps)

  1. 1. Demonstrate the platform's ability to analyze a large genomic dataset.
  2. 2. Provide a tutorial on how to use the platform's analysis and visualization tools.
  3. 3. Submit the source code, system architecture, and a list of supported data formats.

Deadline: 220 days after this bounty goes live.

üí∏ Personal Finance and Budgeting App

Create an app that helps users manage their personal finances and stick to a budget. The app should make it easy to track income and expenses, set financial goals, and save money.

Project Snapshot

Prize Pool 23,000,000 VND

What to Build

A mobile app with features for connecting bank accounts, categorizing transactions, and creating custom budgets. The app should provide personalized insights and tips for improving financial health.

How to Submit (3 steps)

  1. 1. Submit the app with support for major banks in the target market.
  2. 2. Provide a security plan for protecting user's financial data.
  3. 3. Deliver the source code and design files.

Deadline: 90 days after this bounty goes live.

title: AI-Powered Code Review and Analysis Tool

detail.main_content:
üîç AI-Powered Code Review and Analysis Tool

Develop a tool that uses AI to automatically review code for quality, security, and performance issues. The tool should help developers write better code and reduce the time spent on manual code reviews.

Project Snapshot

Prize Pool 34,000,000 VND

What to Build

A tool that integrates with popular version control systems (e.g., GitHub, GitLab) and provides automated feedback on pull requests. The tool should use machine learning to identify common coding errors and suggest improvements.

How to Submit (3 steps)

  1. 1. Provide a live demo of the tool analyzing a complex codebase.
  2. 2. Submit a report on the tool's accuracy and performance.
  3. 3. Deliver the source code and the trained AI models.

Deadline: 130 days after this bounty goes live.

title: Customer Loyalty and Rewards Program Platform

detail.main_content:
üéÅ Customer Loyalty and Rewards Program Platform

Create a platform for businesses to launch and manage customer loyalty and rewards programs. The platform should help businesses increase customer retention and lifetime value.

Project Snapshot

Prize Pool 25,000,000 VND

What to Build

A platform with features for creating tiered loyalty programs, offering points and rewards, and tracking customer activity. The platform should integrate with popular e-commerce and POS systems.

How to Submit (3 steps)

  1. 1. Provide a demo of the platform with a few sample loyalty programs.
  2. 2. Submit a case study of a business that has successfully used the platform.
  3. 3. Deliver the full source code and integration guides.

Deadline: 100 days after this bounty goes live.
